content:
Mobile Insurance Open Claims Component

Show your mobile Policyholder users a snapshot of their open claims, and link them to additional information about the claims with this component.

This component is designed for mobile and styled with the Newport Design System. It displays:

* A text label: "Open Claims"
* Open claims in a child component (Mobile Insurance Open Claims Child Component)

Users can click on a claim to go to the claim details page.

The FlexCard structure contains:

* A text element with the chosen label
* The Mobile Insurance Open Claims Child component

You can add, remove, or change elements based on your needs. To learn how, see Add Elements to a FlexCard.

Many elements contain Custom CSS styles that you can modify for a different look and feel.

This component is part of the Digital Experience Site Component Customization Overview.

Mobile Insurance Open Claims Child Component

Use this child component to show users a snapshot of their open claims and link them to additional information about the claims. It's designed for mobile and can be used inside the Mobile Insurance Open Claims container component.
title: Mobile Insurance Open Claims Component
